item.title: Increasing Happiness
item.description: The Science of Happiness While taking the science of well being course on coursera I decided to take the course quite seriously. For one, I started without taking any of my baseline assumptions for granted and applied my skepticism as best as I could to “commong knowledge” ways of looking at happiness. Overall the course was a good start on a life long journey to find meaning and happiness.
